Field Detail

NORMAL

public static final int NORMAL
Normal behavior. The isPressed() method returns true as long as the key is held down.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DETECT_INITAL_PRESS_ONLY

public static final int DETECT_INITAL_PRESS_ONLY
Initial press behavior. The isPressed() method returns true only after the key is first pressed, and not again until the key is released and pressed again.

See Also:

GameAction

public GameAction(java.lang.String name)
Create a new GameAction with the NORMAL behavior.

Parameters:
name - is a String value wich is the name of the GameAction

GameAction

public GameAction(java.lang.String name,
                  int behavior)
Create a new GameAction with the specified behavior.

Method Detail

getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Method getName Gets the name of this GameAction.

Returns:
a String value wich the name of this GameAction

reset

public void reset()
Method reset Resets this GameAction so that it appears like it hasn't been pressed.

tap

public void tap()
Method tap Taps this GameAction. Same as calling press() followed by release().

press

public void press()
Method press Signals that the key was pressed.

press

public void press(int amount)
Method press Signals that the key was pressed a specified number of times, or that the mouse move a spcified distance.

Parameters:
amount - is an Integer value wich is the number of times

release

public void release()
Method release Signals that the key was released

isPressed

public boolean isPressed()
Method isPressed Returns whether the key was pressed or not since last checked.

Returns:
a boolean value that is true if the key was pressed since the last time checked and is false if not

getAmount

public int getAmount()
Method getAmount For keys, this is the number of times the key was pressed since it was last checked. For mouse movement, this is the distance moved.

Returns:
an Integer value that is the number of times the key was pressed or the distance the mouse was moved since it was last checked
